title: What is a strong point in favour of Mahatma Gandhi? - Quora

response.answer_text: So many people indicate the faults of Mahātmā Mohandas Karamchand Gandhi but does it effects anybody? NO! It’s like asking the lamp posts if dogs affect them.Mahatma Gandhi is considered one of the greatest leaders that the world has even seen.He is a role model for all the upcoming leaders. Gandhi got his start as an activist in South Africa, not India.When Gandhi was growing up, few people would’ve predicted he’d one day attract millions of followers, be considered the father of his nation and even appear in Apple’s “Think Different” advertising campaign in the late 1990s. In fact, as a boy, Gandhi was a middling student and extremely shy. He even described running home from school so he wouldn’t have to talk to anybody.He led the Indian nationalist movement and became known around the world and is the face of INDIAN CURRENCY till date.

His being a Satyagrahi was his strong point. He used it as a weapon to get at his target. He was the first effective personality in the Colonial India to defeat the English on the moral ground thus compelling them to free the country.
